tweet: On the same day the Senate passed #USMCA & a day after @POTUS signed the China Phase One Agreement, I was delighted to meet with some of my fellow OK wheat growers & members of @wheatworld. Oklahoma plants the 5th most wheat in the U.S. & I’m proud to support all of its growers. pic.twitter.com/b8A2pxEY2y

The U.S. Senate just overwhelmingly voted to send the #USMCA to @POTUS's desk to be signed! 

After an initial announcement a little more than a year ago, Oklahoma's farmers, manufacturers, & businesses will finally reap the benefits of a modernized trade deal with our neighbors. https://twitter.com/okfarmbureau/status/1217866730988548096 …

This morning, @POTUS signed a historic Phase One trade agreement with China. Delivering on his promise to renegotiate unfair trade deals, @realDonaldTrump is leveling the playing field for America's farmers, manufacturers, & businesses. 

READ MORE⬇️ https://lucas.house.gov/press-release/lucas-applauds-signing-us-china-phase-one-trade-deal …

I applaud @AjitPaiFCC's commitment to expanding rural broadband through the Rural Digital Opportunity Fund. 162,000 Oklahoma small businesses, family farms, & rural homes will be eligible, bridging the digital divide between rural & urban America. https://okcfox.com/news/local/rural-oklahoma-communities-could-be-eligible-for-high-speed-broadband …

But don’t just take my word for it. Listen to @ThisIsNDC President & CEO Faith Bautista explain why modernizing these regulations will benefit low-and-moderate income communities⬇️ pic.twitter.com/wwvNO2Eh23

Community Reinvestment Act regulations haven't been updated since 1995. The @USOCC & @FDICgov's proposal to modernize the #CRA is a welcomed update designed to encourage more investment in communities that need it most. https://twitter.com/FinancialCmte/status/1217190054956761090 …

DYK: U.S. News & World Report ranked the @StephensonCC at @OUMedicine in the Top 50 in the nation for cancer treatment. 

Last week I met with Chuck Spicer to discuss the strides @OUMedicine is making in education, research & patient care for Oklahomans & those around the region. pic.twitter.com/gTVI4xUazD

The U.S. economy is strong. Adding 145,000 jobs in December, U.S. employers have now added more than 2 million jobs in 2019. 

With the passage of #USMCA & the signing of a U.S.-China Phase-One trade deal, the U.S. economy's future looks prosperous. https://www.wsj.com/articles/december-jobs-report-11578657600?mod=hp_lead_pos1 …

Tonight, House Democrats voted to undermine @POTUS at a time when Congress should be united behind the strength of our national defense.

I'm extremely thankful that no Americans were injured in the Iranian attacks on U.S. military bases last night. @POTUS' message was strong & clear. Moving forward I hope Iran will answer @POTUS' call for de-escalation & join U.S. efforts for a peaceful future in the Middle East.
